property.value: For each card named Pyrrhian Eternals in your discard pile, this unit gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached unit gets +1 ATK. Reaction: After attached unit is declared as an attacker, discard the top 2 cards of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, return a target [NECRON] unit from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Warrior. Sautekh.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gains 1 command icon while you have 2 or more non-[NECRON] factions among units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit is declared as an attacker, discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier. Novokh.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each non-[NECRON] Warrior unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK and +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit destroys an enemy unit by an attack, your opponent must reveal his hand and discard each revealed card with the same name as the destroyed unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Deploy this card from your discard pile at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After the combat phase begins, discard the top card of your deck. This unit gets +X ATK until the end of the phase. X is the printed cost of the discarded card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Warrior. Sautekh.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a non-[NECRON] Soldier unit at this planet to ready this unit. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle. Sautekh.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy a non-[NECRON] Scout unit, move this unit to a planet. Then, a target non-warlord unit at this planet gets -1 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Wargear Attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit would be destroyed by taking damage, remove all damage from it and move this unit to an adjacent planet instead. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: During a battle at this planet, discard a unit card from your hand to remove 2 damage from a [NECRON] army unit you control at this planet. (Limit once per combat round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier. Sautekh.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to move it to a planet with an enemy warlord with a faction that matches your enslaved faction.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 6 or more units in your discard pile, this unit gets +2 ATK and gains Armorbane.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Scholar. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play each [NECRON] event card from your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Forced Reaction: After you play a [NECRON] event card from your discard pile, remove that card from the game.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Soldier. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 6 or more units in your discard pile, this unit gets +4 HP. Your opponent must declare a ready unit named Lynchguard Sentinel as a defender, if able.

property.value: Vehicle. Sautekh. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, put a non-Elite Vehicle unit into play from your discard pile at this planet.

property.value: No Wargear Attachments. Flying.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of non-[NECRON] factions among units you control.

property.value: No Wargear Attachments. Area Effect (X).

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then, put a non-Vehicle [NECRON] unit discarded by this effect into play at this planet. (Limit once per round.)

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Wargear Attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Remove up to 2 damage from a [NECRON] unit you control. Max 1 per round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard 2 cards from your hand. Then, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Each [NECRON] unit you control at a target planet gets +2 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Put a target non-[NECRON] unit with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your discard pile at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Each non-unique non-[NECRON] unit at a target planet gets -3 HP until the end of the phase. You must pass during your next deployment turn.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wargear. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [NECRON] army unit. Combat Action: During a battle at this planet, Exhaust attached unit to give a target enemy unit at this planet -2 HP until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [NECRON] army unit. Rection: After a phase begins or a combat round at this planet begins, remove 1 damage from attached unit.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Wargear. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a [NECRON] army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK and gains Armorbane. Action: Discard a card from your hand to attach this card to another eligible unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an Elite [NECRON] unit you control. Reaction: After a combat round at this planet begins, if the topmost card of your discard pile is a non-Elite [NECRON] unit, put it into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a non-Elite army unit. Action: If attached unit's faction symbol matches your enslaved faction, exhaust this attachment to gain control of attached unit until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you deploy a [NECRON] card, exhaust this support to reduce that card's cost by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a phase begins, exhaust this support to have each player discard the top 2 cards of his deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to choose a card in a target player's discard pile and place it on top of that discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy a unit from a non-[NECRON] faction, if you control no other units from that faction, gain 1 [RESOURCE] or draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support and sacrifice a Drone card to remove all damage from a target [NECRON] army unit you control and ready it.

property.name: Type
property.value: Artillery. Upgrade.

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Exhaust this support and shuffle any number of unit cards from your discard pile into your deck to deal X damage to a target non-Elite army unit. X is the number of cards shuffled into your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Army units with printed cost 2 or lower do not count their command icons during command struggles at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your opponent triggers an ability that targets an Elite unit you control, cancel its effects. Then, if that ability was triggered from an army unit, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Reaction: After an enemy army unit moves to or from attached planet, exhaust this attachment to deal 2 damage to that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Interrupt: When you deploy an Elite unit, exhaust this support to reduce the cost of that unit by 2.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Space Marine

property.name: Traits
property.value: Scout. Dark Angels.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[SPACE MARINE] warlord, this unit gains Mobile. Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to move an army unit you control at this planet to another planet.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Astra Militarum

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[ASTRA MILITARUM] warlord, you may deploy this unit from your hand as if it had Ambush. Reaction: After this unit enters play, ready an army unit you control at this planet.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Warrior. Boyz.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[ORK] warlord, this unit gains 1 command icon. Reaction: After this unit readies, each player deals 1 indirect damage among units he controls at this planet.

property.name: Type
property.value: Daemon. Slaanesh. Elite.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Scout. Dark Angels.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[CHAOS] warlord, this unit gains Mobile. Reaction: After this unit moves to a planet, deal X damage to a target enemy army unit at that planet. X is the number of command icons the target unit has.

property.name: Faction
property.value: Dark Eldar

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[DARK ELDAR] warlord, this unit gains Armorbane. Forced Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, sacrifice another army unit at this planet.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Vehicle. Elite.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[ELDAR] warlord, this unit gains Area Effect (2). Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to move an army unit you control at this planet to another planet.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No Wargear Attachments. Flying.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Scout. Pilot.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control a non-[TAU] warlord, this unit gains Flying. Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to move an attachment from a unit you control at this planet to another eligible unit you control.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Leviathan. Termagant.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, put X Termagant tokens into play at this planet. X is the number of factions among enemy units at this planet.
